sourcesContent:
import { Avatar, Box, Center, Stack, Text, VStack } from '@chakra-ui/react'
import React from 'react'

const Footer = () => {
    return (
        <Box bgColor={'blackAlpha.900'} color={'whiteAlpha.700'} px={'16'} py={["16", "8"]}>
            <Stack direction={['column', 'row']} h={'full'} alignItems={'center'}>
                <VStack w={'full'} alignItems={['center', 'flex-start']}>
                    <Text fontWeight={'bold'}>About Us</Text>
                    <Text fontSize={'sm'} letterSpacing={'widest'} textAlign={['center', 'left']} >We are the best crypto trading app in india, we provide our guidance at a very cheap price.</Text>
                </VStack>
                <VStack>
                    <Avatar boxSize={'28'} mt={['4', '0']}> </Avatar>
                    <Text>Our Founder</Text>
                </VStack>
            </Stack>
        </Box>
    )
}

export default Footer
